name: Tumblr - Floral
description:
how sweet~

if you know the coding to change any of the following, let me know in a discussion!
- the blue colour behind recommended blogs
- the blue lines on the right for separation
- the blue colour behind "_______ has liked your post.."
- the green colour behind "following ___ people"

discussions.name: how do you uninstall the backgrounds/tweaks?
